Text:
Hello,
Please post installation instructions in English too. Thanks. Is the software with an English interface, right or wrong?

Contrary to the picture and description, this is not the Production Suite version!!!
That means, this DOES NOT contain the Vocal Eraser, 400 exclusive soundtracks and the Quick Start tutorial DVD!
This is the plain Vegas Movie Studio HD Platinum 11.
To check the difference: http://www.sonycreativesoftware.com/vegassoftware
